attributes.action: Introduce an "Advanced driving test" for all taxi and Private hire drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I strongly believe as an existing taxi driver that the driving standards throughout the trade is below average.
The only requirement to enter the trade is a UK full license.
In the sole Interest of public safety I propose an Advanced test is a compulsory requirement for all drivers.
( Private hire and Hackney carriage ).
This would hopefully give the passenger in these vehicles a better service standard and make every journey safer due to the enhanced skills of there driver.
Generally drivers at present have driven for a number of years and implanted poor driving habits into there daily driving routine making them a high risk factor and them-self becoming a hazard to road users,
pedestrians and more so there passengers.
